mapper.insert: insert into farm_qna_question (farm_qna_question_no, farm_no, farmer_no, user_no, title, content, reg_date, hits) values(farm_qna_question_seq.nextval, 1, #{farmerNo}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT fq.farm_qna_question_no, fq.title, fq.hits, fq.reg_date, fq.content, fq.farmer_no, f.name FROM farm_qna_question fq, farmer f WHERE fq.farmer_no = f.farmer_no AND fq.farm_qna_question_no = #{farmQnaQuestionNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE farm_qna_question SET farm_qna_question_no = #{farmQnaQuestionNo}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE farm_qna_question_no = #{farmQnaQuestionNo}
mapper.select: select farm_no from farm where farmer_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into farm_qna_answer(farm_qna_answer_no, content, reg_date, farmer_no, farm_qna_question_no) values(farm_qna_answer_seq.nextval, #{content}, sysdate, #{farmerNo}, #{farmQnaQuestionNo})
